diseases.name: Flu
diseases.treatment: Rest, fluids, antiviral medication if prescribed
diseases.prevention: Vaccination, hand hygiene, avoiding sick people

diseases.name: Dengue
diseases.prevention: Mosquito control, avoid stagnant water
remedies: Papaya leaf juice to improve platelet count

diseases.name: Diabetes
diseases.causes: Insulin resistance or lack of insulin
diseases.prevention: Healthy diet, exercise, weight management

diseases.name: Hypertension
diseases.treatment: Medication, reduced salt intake, stress management
diseases.prevention: Regular exercise, low-salt diet, avoid smoking

diseases.name: Malaria
diseases.prevention: Mosquito nets, repellents, prophylactic medication

diseases.name: COVID-19
diseases.treatment: Isolation, supportive care, antivirals if prescribed
diseases.prevention: Vaccination, mask-wearing, social distancing

diseases.name: Tuberculosis
diseases.prevention: BCG vaccination, avoid exposure to infected individuals

diseases.name: Typhoid
diseases.prevention: Vaccination, safe food and water practices

diseases.name: Asthma
diseases.prevention: Avoid allergens, use preventive inhalers, monitor lung function

diseases.name: Pneumonia
diseases.prevention: Vaccination, hand hygiene, avoid smoking

diseases.name: Bronchitis
diseases.treatment: Rest, fluids, cough medicine, bronchodilators if needed
diseases.prevention: Avoid smoking, good hygiene, use masks in polluted areas

diseases.name: Hepatitis A
diseases.causes: Hepatitis A virus via contaminated food/water
diseases.prevention: Vaccination, hygiene, clean water

diseases.name: Hepatitis B
diseases.prevention: Vaccination, safe sex, avoid sharing needles

diseases.name: Migraine
diseases.treatment: Pain relief medication, rest in dark room
diseases.prevention: Avoid triggers, stress management, regular sleep

diseases.name: Stroke
diseases.causes: Blocked or burst blood vessel in brain
diseases.treatment: Emergency medical care, clot-busting drugs, rehabilitation
diseases.prevention: Control BP, cholesterol, no smoking

diseases.name: Epilepsy
diseases.prevention: Avoid head injury, regular meds

diseases.name: Anemia
diseases.treatment: Iron supplements, diet rich in iron
diseases.prevention: Iron-rich diet, control bleeding

diseases.name: Leukemia
diseases.causes: Uncontrolled growth of abnormal white blood cells
diseases.prevention: No sure prevention, healthy lifestyle

diseases.name: Kidney Stones
diseases.treatment: Pain relief, hydration, surgery if large
diseases.prevention: Drink plenty of fluids, reduce salt

diseases.name: UTI
diseases.prevention: Hygiene, drink water

diseases.name: Arthritis
diseases.prevention: Maintain healthy weight, avoid joint strain

diseases.name: Osteoporosis
diseases.prevention: Healthy diet, exercise, no smoking

diseases.name: Obesity
diseases.prevention: Balanced diet, physical activity

diseases.name: Depression
diseases.prevention: Early care, social support

diseases.name: Anxiety
diseases.prevention: Stress management, healthy lifestyle

diseases.name: Alzheimer’s
diseases.prevention: Mental activity, healthy lifestyle

diseases.name: Parkinson’s
diseases.prevention: Healthy diet, exercise

diseases.name: Appendicitis
diseases.prevention: No guaranteed prevention

diseases.name: Gallstones
diseases.prevention: Healthy weight, avoid fatty food

diseases.name: GERD
diseases.prevention: Avoid spicy food, eat small meals

diseases.name: Peptic Ulcer
diseases.prevention: Avoid NSAIDs, treat H. pylori

diseases.name: Irritable Bowel Syndrome
diseases.prevention: Healthy diet, stress control

diseases.name: Constipation
diseases.prevention: Fiber-rich diet, water

diseases.name: Diarrhea
diseases.prevention: Safe food, hygiene

diseases.name: Cholera
diseases.prevention: Clean water, sanitation

diseases.name: Meningitis
diseases.prevention: Vaccination, avoid exposure

diseases.name: Measles
diseases.prevention: MMR vaccination

diseases.name: Chickenpox
diseases.prevention: Vaccination

diseases.name: Rabies
diseases.prevention: Vaccinate pets, avoid stray animals

diseases.name: Polio
diseases.prevention: Polio vaccination

diseases.name: Whooping Cough
diseases.prevention: DTaP vaccine

diseases.name: Sinusitis
diseases.prevention: Avoid allergens, good hygiene

diseases.name: Allergic Rhinitis
diseases.prevention: Avoid allergens

diseases.name: Eczema
diseases.prevention: Avoid irritants, skin hydration

diseases.name: Psoriasis
diseases.prevention: Avoid triggers, stress management

diseases.name: Ringworm
diseases.prevention: Keep skin dry, avoid sharing clothes

diseases.name: Conjunctivitis
diseases.prevention: Avoid touching eyes, hygiene

diseases.name: Celiac Disease
diseases.causes: Immune reaction to gluten (wheat, barley, rye)
diseases.prevention: Avoid gluten-containing foods

diseases.name: Gout
diseases.causes: Uric acid crystal buildup in joints
diseases.prevention: Limit alcohol, avoid red meat, maintain healthy weight

diseases.name: Cataract
diseases.prevention: Wear sunglasses, control diabetes, avoid smoking

diseases.name: Glaucoma
diseases.causes: High eye pressure damaging optic nerve
diseases.prevention: Regular eye exams, manage diabetes, protect eyes

diseases.name: Hemophilia
diseases.prevention: Avoid injury, careful with medications

diseases.name: Thalassemia
diseases.treatment: Blood transfusions, iron chelation, bone marrow transplant
diseases.prevention: Genetic counseling

diseases.name: Pancreatitis
diseases.prevention: Limit alcohol, healthy diet, avoid smoking

diseases.name: Cirrhosis
diseases.causes: Chronic alcohol use, hepatitis B/C, fatty liver disease
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle changes, medication, liver transplant if severe
diseases.prevention: Avoid alcohol, maintain healthy weight, vaccination for hepatitis

diseases.name: Lyme Disease
diseases.prevention: Avoid tick bites, use insect repellent

diseases.name: HIV/AIDS
diseases.prevention: Safe sex, avoid needle sharing, mother-to-child prevention

diseases.name: Common Cold
diseases.prevention: Hand hygiene, avoid close contact with infected people

diseases.name: Tonsillitis
diseases.causes: Viral or bacterial infection (Streptococcus bacteria common)
diseases.treatment: Antibiotics if bacterial, rest, warm fluids
diseases.prevention: Good hygiene, avoid close contact with sick people

diseases.name: Acne
diseases.causes: Clogged pores, excess oil, bacteria, hormones
diseases.prevention: Wash face regularly, avoid oily food, stress management

diseases.name: Hair Loss (Alopecia)
diseases.causes: Genetics, stress, hormonal changes, poor nutrition
diseases.prevention: Balanced diet, stress control, avoid harsh chemicals

diseases.name: Food Poisoning
diseases.causes: Contaminated food or water (bacteria, viruses, toxins)
diseases.prevention: Safe food handling, proper cooking, clean water

diseases.name: Acidity (Acid Reflux)
diseases.causes: Overeating, spicy food, weak esophageal sphincter
diseases.prevention: Eat small meals, avoid spicy food, don’t lie down after eating

diseases.name: Skin Allergy
diseases.causes: Allergens like dust, food, medicines, insect bites
diseases.prevention: Avoid allergens, keep skin clean, use hypoallergenic products

diseases.name: Heat Stroke
diseases.causes: Prolonged exposure to high temperatures and dehydration
diseases.treatment: Immediate cooling, IV fluids, hospitalization if severe
diseases.prevention: Stay hydrated, avoid excessive heat exposure

diseases.name: Sunburn
diseases.treatment: Cool compress, aloe vera gel, pain relievers
diseases.prevention: Use sunscreen, protective clothing, avoid peak sun hours

diseases.name: Dehydration
diseases.causes: Excessive fluid loss from heat, exercise, diarrhea, vomiting
diseases.treatment: Rehydration with water or oral rehydration solutions
diseases.prevention: Drink adequate water daily, especially in hot weather

diseases.name: Insomnia
diseases.causes: Stress, anxiety, caffeine, irregular sleep schedule
diseases.treatment: Cognitive behavioral therapy, sleep aids (if prescribed)
diseases.prevention: Regular sleep routine, limit caffeine, reduce screen time before bed

diseases.name: Sinusitis
diseases.treatment: Decongestants, antibiotics if bacterial, steam inhalation
diseases.prevention: Treat colds early, avoid allergens, maintain hygiene

diseases.name: Urinary Tract Infection (UTI)
diseases.prevention: Good personal hygiene, drink plenty of fluids, urinate after intercourse

diseases.name: Migraine
diseases.causes: Stress, hormonal changes, lack of sleep, certain foods
diseases.prevention: Identify triggers, regular sleep, balanced diet

diseases.name: Conjunctivitis (Pink Eye)
diseases.treatment: Antibiotic/antiviral eye drops, antihistamines if allergic
diseases.prevention: Avoid touching eyes, wash hands regularly, don’t share towels

diseases.name: Eczema
diseases.prevention: Avoid harsh soaps, keep skin moisturized, wear soft clothing

diseases.name: Gallstones
diseases.causes: Excess cholesterol or bilirubin in bile
diseases.treatment: Surgery (cholecystectomy) if severe, medications to dissolve stones
diseases.prevention: Healthy diet, maintain weight, avoid fatty foods
remedies: Apple cider vinegar with warm water

diseases.name: Osteoarthritis
diseases.causes: Wear and tear of cartilage, aging, obesity
diseases.treatment: Pain relievers, physiotherapy, joint replacement surgery in severe cases
diseases.prevention: Regular exercise, healthy weight, avoid joint injuries

diseases.name: Sciatica
symptoms: sharp pain radiating from lower back to legs
diseases.causes: Herniated disc, spinal stenosis, muscle spasm pressing on sciatic nerve
diseases.treatment: Pain relievers, physiotherapy, surgery if severe
diseases.prevention: Maintain posture, exercise, avoid lifting heavy weights incorrectly

diseases.name: Bronchitis
diseases.causes: Viral or bacterial infection, smoking, air pollution
diseases.treatment: Rest, fluids, inhalers, antibiotics if bacterial
diseases.prevention: Avoid smoking, wear masks in polluted areas, strengthen immunity
